// Measure_And_Label.txt
//
// Measures, outlines and labels the current selection.
// The selection is outlined in the current foreground
// color. Move this file to the plugins folder and restart 
// ImageJ to create a "Measure and Label" command.
// Use Plugins>Shortcuts>Create Shortcut to 
// create a keyboard shortcut. Remove the "//" at
// the start of the 4th line to always outline
// in yellow on RGB images.

  outlineWidth = 2;
  run("Measure");
  run("Line Width...", "line="+outlineWidth);
  // setForegroundColor(255,255,0); // yellow
  run("Draw");
  run("Label");
